ServiceComplementaire.dc:title: Registration for the mini-one-stop-shop for a non-EU operator
ServiceComplementaire.dc:creator: Direction de l'information légale et administrative
ServiceComplementaire.dc:subject: Fiscalité
ServiceComplementaire.dc:description: Registration for the mini-one-stop-shop for a non-EU operator - Formulaire
ServiceComplementaire.dc:publisher: Direction de l'information légale et administrative
ServiceComplementaire.dc:contributor: Direction de l'information légale et administrative (Premier ministre)

FilDAriane.Niveau: Registration for the mini-one-stop-shop for a non-EU operator

Texte.Paragraphe: If you are a business not established in the EU and you supply electronic services to non-taxable consumers who are established in a Member State (B2C), you can register for the scheme and declare and pay VAT on services in all Member States through the electronic gateway provided by the DGFiP.

OuSAdresser.Titre: Service des impôts des entreprises étrangères (SIEE)

Chapitre.Paragraphe: Service des impôts des entreprises étrangères (SIEE)
Direction des résidents à l'étranger et des services généraux (DRESG)
Ouvert du lundi au vendredi de 9h à 12h30 et de 13h30 à 16h
